text: Amir Jadidi (born June 21, 1984) is an Iranian actor and tennis player. He is famous in Iran for his roles in movies like Crazy Rook (2015), A Dragon Arrives (2016), The Lost Strait (2018), Cold Sweat (2018), and Day Zero (2020). Internationally, he is best known for playing Rahim in the movie A Hero (2021), which won the Grand Prix at the 74th Cannes Film Festival. Jadidi also won an award at the Palm Springs International Film Festival for his performance in A Hero. == References == ==Other websites== *Amir Jadidi Website *Amir Jadidi: A Comprehensive Guide to His Life and Career * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Actors
title: Amir Jadidi
